title: ‘Time’s Monster’ Review: Empire of the Historians
sub_head: Does academic history always serve the ends of the powerful?
body:
Undergraduate majors in history have plummeted in American colleges, faster—Priya Satia tells us—than any other major in recent years. Gone are the days depicted in “The History Boys,” Alan Bennett’s play set in Britain in the 1980s, “when history was understood to be about great men, and its study the ideal preparation for young boys aspiring to be great men.”
